StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Ambitious finance professional with strong track-record of delivering top performance. Possess large spectrum of experience in financial markets & products, industry research, business valuation and financial reporting. Proficient in working with various groups, including: legal, IT, sales and customers to determine optimal strategies for accomplishing goals. Open to relocation.

PositionHistory.Title: SUMMER INTERNSHIP DURING MBA PROGRAM
PositionHistory.Description: SUMMER INTERNSHIP DURING MBA PROGRAM STANDARD CHARTERED BANK Gurgaon, India Analyst - Debt Capital Market Jul 2010 - Aug 2010 • Created financial forecasting credit models to identify future debt-financing opportunities and to establish risk targets • Assessed company valuations by using discounted cash flow and relative valuation methods such as Price/EPS, Enterprise value/EBITDA, etc. through evaluation of 10K, 10Q, management interviews, conference calls and analyst presentations • Forecasted company's cash flow based on fundamental analysis and conducted industry research for comparable peer analysis • Recommended buy/sell/hold opinion on company stock while using sensitivity and scenario analysis • Industry coverage: real estate; IT products and services and engineering & construction

PositionHistory.Title: Financial Analyst - Corporate Finance
PositionHistory.Description: PRE-MBA EXPERIENCE AON HEWITT Gurgaon, India Financial Analyst - Corporate Finance Oct 2007 - Apr 2008 • Reviewed and scrutinized legal contracts for 60 global clients in consulting segment with annual revenue of $50 million • Recognized revenues; allocated revenue to departments; assessed invoices and performed monthly estimates and reviews • Prepared accounting schedules, monthly MIS & variance report and created framework for common reporting across departments using advanced excel and facilitated accurate revenue reporting • Identified growth opportunities with management to enhance value-proposition & initiated best practices sessions

PositionHistory.Title: Finance Associate - First Magnus Financial Corporation
PositionHistory.Description: WNS MORTGAGE SERVICES Gurgaon, India Finance Associate - First Magnus Financial Corporation Jan 2007 - Aug 2007 • Performed comprehensive credit analysis while analyzing financial reports, credit ratings and cash flow implications • Managed multiple projects effectively by thinking strategically and mentored 15 new team members within the team • Received formal training on capital markets information, global financial markets, fixed income and mortgage securities

PositionHistory.Title: Analyst - Corporate Accounting and Finance
PositionHistory.Description: INFINITY CALLTECH Delhi, India Analyst - Corporate Accounting and Finance Jan 2003 - Dec 2006 • Led a team of employees, coordinated work activities, developed and executed corporate operational strategy effectively • Managed daily accounting & bank reconciliations and performed forecasting, budgeting, financial analysis • Identified opportunities for business development and expanded client relationships independently in different sectors

School.SchoolName: CLARK UNIVERSITY - GRADUATE SCHOOL OF MANAGEMENT

Degree.Comments: (CFA Level 2 Candidate - June'2015) CLARK UNIVERSITY - GRADUATE SCHOOL OF MANAGEMENT Boston, MA

Master's in Business Administration, Major in Finance May 2011
• Academics: 3.6 GPA with an A in Corporate Finance, M&A, Financial Statement Analysis, Strategy & Financial Modeling • Honors: received 30% merit scholarship as tuition waiver and won a virtual stock trading completion on Stock track • Leadership: led diversified team of five for the consulting project and strategy management
DELHI UNIVERSITY - Bachelors in Commerce (Hons.) July, 2002

POST-MBA EXPERIENCE DUN & BRADSTREET – SOUTH ASIA MIDDLE EAST Doha, Qatar Associate Consultant – SME Ratings & Advisory August 2014 - Present • Working for SME ratings, which involves in-depth rating evaluation (industry, business, management/promoter and audited financials), leading management discussion, report writing and feedback generation • Closely engaged with various stakeholders including Government Entities, Family Groups & SMEs across diverse industries • Primarily involved in conducting market research, business performance ratings and feasibility studies for SMEs in Qatar • Extensively worked on various financial models to estimate impact of strategic decisions in both Greenfield and Brownfield businesses • Conducting primary and secondary research for consulting projects across multiple sectors (healthcare, manufacturing, retail and construction) • Looking for a change due to prevailing family VISA issues in Qatar
CRISIL LTD. Pune, Maharashtra Senior Credit Analyst – Standard & Poor’s Corporate Rating Nov 2011 – June 2014 • Worked for Global Analytical Center – S&P’s corporate rating division & Handling Real Estate (REITs & Developers) Portfolio for EMEA region including UK, Europe, Israel and entire GCC countries • Evaluated business/financial environment to outline scores and formulate opinion on different aspects of rating • Detailed research on fundamental drivers of real estate, credit risk, capital structure, M&A activities for industry portfolio • Gauged business risk (industry/ country/ competitive position / peer comparison/ management and governance) and assessed financial risk (financial position/ profitability/ capital structure/ covenants/ cash flow adequacy) • Thorough finding in different product types (e.g. office, commercial, retail, residential, logistics) and their performance in various segments of real estate capital markets -- public debt, private debt, public equity and private equity • Extensively worked on Financial modeling, cash flows projections, liquidity analysis to outline different scores and formulate opinion on wide-ranging rating dynamics • Analyzed management & governance policies, financial policies and hedging policies for the risk management framework • Coordinated with Clients for effective work flow and facilitating presentation for management meeting & CMT • Knowledge of research databases such as CBRE, JLL, C&W and etc.
Awards and Recognition:
• Recipient of Ace award from S&P Core CMT for outstanding analysis and delivering outstanding performance in the testing environment to support new corporate criteria implementation across S&P offices • Recipient of Spot and Clap award for providing exceptional support to S&P Israel office despite having Hebrew language operational challenges and effectively managing workflow, client coordination and maintaining highest quality standards. • Cleared Analytical Certification Training (ACT) from Standard and Poor’s rating services to meet EMEA/US Compliance requirement

LicenseOrCertification.Name: CFA
CMT
ACT
Bloomberg certification for equity, fixed Income, foreign exchange and commodity essentials
KEY PROJECTS UNDERTAKEN - in Global Environment during MBA program
• Developed a Real time business plan, for a start -up utility (propane) company, including, feasibility study, market
assessment, industry trends, projection of financial statements, while evaluating seasonality, supply, infrastructure support,
alternative energy peer comparison and competitive strategies
• Analyzed financial statements of Wal-Mart, Target and Sears to access comparative performance on the basis of ratio
analysis such as liquidity, solvency, profitability, activity, cash flows, vertical and horizontal analysis, and the convergence of US
GAAP and IFRS for crucial financial adjustments impact of varied accounting policies, risk factors, internal controls, leases, off-
balance sheet arrangements, foreign currency translations, credit & hedging policies, pension benefits and derivatives exposure.
• Performed different equity valuation methods such as Gordon discount (dividend discount), EV/EBITDA multiples and relative
valuation models for Yahoo, Hershey and Bank of America and Proposed stock recommendation such as buy, sell or hold for
different time frames.
• Evaluated Mergers & Acquisitions synergies and valuation for Bank of America and Merrill Lynch to evaluate the impact of
merger on business activities and identified contingency pattern, major phases, key issues and integration process
• Examined and reviewed the managerial strategy of Pacer International (Transport and Logistics Industry) with detailed
analysis of on Industry, sub-sector, structure, strategic groups and profiles of competitors on the basis of Porters Five Forces
model, SWOT analysis, Internal and External environment, Functional/business/corporate level Strategies.
• Special project on the importance of ESG norms and implementations with the growing social investing concerns around the
world with key evaluations on rating criteria globally.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: SANYAM SINGHANIA's experience appears to be concentrated in Finance / Financial Planning & Analysis, with exposure to Degreed Accounting / Accounts Receivable. SANYAM SINGHANIA has 5 years of work experience, with no management experience.

sov:Hobbies.sov:Text:
Reading newspaper and other social activities
ADDITIONAL • Computer: Thoroughly proficient in Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel, Word, Access and other PC applications • Accounting: Knowledge of US GAAP, IFRS and Accounting Principles • Finance: Understanding of Corporate Finance, Equity, Fixed income Securities and Derivatives • Financial Modeling: Proficient in implementing standard models for valuing equity, bonds and portfolio optimization • Financial Analysis: Ratio, Macro-Economic, Scenario, 10-K and Cash Flow Analysis • Excel: Well versed with Pivot tables, what - If Analysis, V-look up, financial functions, Solver, Data Tables & Macros • Financial Software: Bloomberg, Thomson, People Soft Applications and Oracle Hyperion • Traits: Detail-oriented, Problem - solving and Quick learner
